name: shwap
description:
Swap all the shapes in the environment.

Controls:

- Global: ESC: Main Menu, R: Restart.

- Rabbit Levels: You can use the arrow keys or WASD to move the rabbit. Clicking on objects will swap them.

- Bull Levels: Right arrow / D: Charge. Space: Jump. Ctrl: Slow Motion. You can charge-jump.
---
Well... this is very unfinished.
We had planned a whole bunch of features, we had a whole bunch of animations, level designs, etc. ready, but we just weren't able to actually place them in game.
Oh well. We'll post a full post-mortem soon, talking about what we had planned and what we did wrong (and also what we did right).
